document.full_text: minmetals resources , china's biggest metals trading firm, on monday offered $6.5 billion to buy equinox minerals , chasing the target company's copper assets in zambia and saudi arabia.
document.title: china's minmetals offers $6.5 billion for equinox
lines_and_colors: minmetals resources , china's biggest metals trading firm, on monday offered $6.5 billion to buy equinox minerals , chasing the target company's copper assets in zambia and saudi arabia.
